introduction: Three-part documentary series about Savile Row, the London street famous for its bespoke tailoring establishments. When giant jeanswear company Abercrombie and Fitch arrives on the street, the tailors fear for their future and identity, but in the past this resilient bunch have seen off the Kaiser, the Luftwaffe and Giorgio Armani. They fight back with an ancient-yet-modern business plan, the model of eco-friendliness, hitting the road to take the service overseas and winning new clients.
